articles.title: Pyrexia or fever may be a key sign that cancer has spread, especially in case of blood cancer - Times of India
articles.description: Pyrexia is the medical term for a raised body temperature or fever, which is a common reaction to infection or illness.

It is not clear why some cancers cause fever more than others. One theory is that certain diseases produce toxins, which can cause fever.
